title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Spanish Speaking Interaction Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Spanish grammar and vocabulary knowledge at the A2 proficiency level
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can produce ≥80% accurate interactive expressions required for the DELE A2 speaking exam
Learners are evaluated on their ability to maintain natural conversational flow during ≥10-minute role-play-based projects
Learners achieve ≥3 points (on a 1-4 scale) in linguistic accuracy and task completion based on peer assessment rubrics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
